alert.note: Alert for El Paso (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 05 at 2:59PM MDT until August 05 at 3:30PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central El Paso County in east central Colorado... * Until 330 PM MDT. * At 258 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Schriever Space Force Base, or 13 miles east of Colorado Springs, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Schriever Space Force Base around 305 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Ellicott. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
